I love boho women’s wear and this is the perfect dress for me.  It is a perfect fit and masks all imperfections while combining cool Indian cotton with dress-it-up-or-down style.  I have since bought almost everything this company makes — tops, skirts, literally everything — on my fixed retirement income, as the prices are amazingly low!
Rich embroidery and fabrics.  Better in person.

This dress is not hand washable - it shrank, especially the decoration. I contacted the seller and they replaced it. Yay! I had the second one dry cleaned and it came back fine. It fits nicely on top and does not cling below the bust. There's a satiny panel in the bust, the rest is a matte finish. The dress is about ankle length on me, 5'4". The red color is on the orange side, rusty red, which I like. There is a black overdye which I think is intended to enhance the sewn on cord decorations and texture of the fabric. I find it a little weird, but it's so hard to find a flattering fit that I can overlook that. Fabric is medium weight and hangs nicely - not thin, flimsy, or see through. The dress has a flowy wide skirt. The quality of the sewing seems good. I usually wear large to extra large. I went by the bust measurements on the chart and got a good fit with the large on the first try.  I would buy from this seller again.
Good material
Beautiful dress, but just didn't fit me accurately.  I really wanted it to fit because I really liked the beauty and flow of the dress.  It was exquisite and I hated to have to return it.
Beautiful dress. Very flowy. The size matches the measurements perfectly. I'm 5'11 and it came mid calf on me.  I will be ordering more from this company!
I love how well this beautifully embroidered dress fits!

First, ignore the sleeves on the picture.  As the name tells you, it is sleeveless. This dress runs a bit small in the bust.  I first ordered a 2X, which should have fit.  It was so tight in the bust, if I had taken a deep breath, it would have burst at the seams.  So I got a 3X, which fits very well.  As usual, I needed to adjust the bottom of the armhole.  But that is very common with sleeveless garments.  Also, the Navy color and Blue 2 look similar onscreen.  I think they are the same color, because I got 1 of each, and I cannot see any difference in the shade of blue.  It is sure to bleed when washed, so I will try to stabilize the dye, so it doesn't bleed or fade.  The tags on the dress are quite honest, and say that there will be these washing issues.

评论概述: Light comfortable breathing dress for hot weather
评论详情: I really like this dress: it is comfortable and light! It has a good length for tall women ,too. I am 5’10” and usually it is hard to find right fitting and long enough  dress. Soft sliming fabric -rayon- is always big bonus especially for living in Florida. I bought two of this dresses in different color and wear them with espadrilles .

Just a little bit tighter. I used the provided size chart.  Gaps around shoulder and arm openings.  I think the dryer will take care of that.  Otherwise it's a lovely dress. Very comfortable.  Cool and flowing. Love the silver color.  The embroidery is beautiful.

I got a lot of compliments on the dress at my casual office. One person thought maybe I had been to the Scottish festival and bought a dress (I think this dress is actually from India). Dress fit nicely for me (bought a small - I am 5'9", size 6, A cup). The downside is that I bought teal/blue and when I went to handwash it, the dye leaked a LOT. I handwash clothes every week and just didn't think about the fact that I hadn't tested it yet and it leaked to the extent that it ruined two pieces of cotton clothing that it must have been touching and neither oxyclean or rubbing alcohol has gotten the dye back out of the other clothes (one can't be bleached). It's not just a few spots of dye -- the dye is streaked ALL OVER those two pieces of cotton clothing... I haven't had any other clothing leak indigo dye that much (even dark jeans). So it's a nice dress, but don't wash it with anything else you don't want ruined -- it's risky!
The dress is beautiful.  A little snug, but I can fix it.
Beautiful dress and light weight. The color was little more towards a rust, rather than a burgundy...but still very nice. This will be perfect at the Ren Fest in the extreme hot weather.

评论概述: Great size selection & high quality material & labor assembly.
评论详情: I love this dress!  I am 5'7" weigh 235 lbs wear a size 22 & have a bit of a 'beer belly'.  I usually wear a 2x but ordered a 3x.  I washed in tepid water with a cold water rinse that had a cup of vinegar in it.  There was some color bleeding, nothing excessive.  I put the dress in the dryer on Perma Press for 50 minutes & it came out beautiful.  It was a bit big under the armpits & across the chest area, but after wash & dry it modestly shrunk to fit very well.  No ironing needed.  The hem falls mid to lower calf & drapes beautifully & hides my bulges.  These are QUALITY garments, well made, nice flowing quality cotton, not see through & should last many years.  I bought this tank top style dress & another dress with spaghetti straps & frilly flared bottom, which I also washed and I hung that one out to dry & it modestly shrunk also.  I also bought this manufacturers short sleeve top in a 3x and washed it the same as the dresses and am also very happy with that.  I love that you can buy these in different sizes & not just One Size Fits All which to me do not fit all!  I highly recommend Agan Traders clothing.  Hope my info is detailed enough to answer your questions!!  One last thing.....  my husband loves how these all look on me as do I!!!
I love this dress! Very comfortable. Elegant style.

The dress is perfect for summer in California. I like that style and fabric. The length are good (I am 5'5"). I didn't wash it yet, so don't know if it will shrink. If Agan Traders can add a short sleeve to that model dress, it will be even better, because I would like to cover top of my arms.
I love the cut and color..

Beautiful dress fits so well .. very well constructed - fits absolutely flatteringly everywhere.. i am 5.1 and even then it's not too dragging.. just right.. dont know how they managed to get this fit so right without beign a specific numbered size..

评论概述: #1004 summer dress: Beautiful Comfortable design-Dress up or down.
评论详情: Beautiful and comfortable dress. I normally wear an XL or 1X. I bought the 2X to allow for shrinkage. It fits perfectly after washing in cold and hanging to dry. I am 5'5 and it comes to the middle of my ankles. Armholes are just right, and the neckline is not too plunging, but low enough to show off a nice solitaire type necklace, pearls look great too. Very well made, charming dress for a summer evening concert in the park. I wear it with a nice thin Cardigan over the shoulders. Can also be worn with a light shirt underneath. Amazingly, this dress does not need ironing. Just wash in cold and hang to dry. It just smooths right out. The upper back has several lines of elastic sewn in horizontally, which allow for a nice comfortable give of a few inches.

评论概述: so handwash (recommended) or wash with very dark or like colors.
评论详情: Holds up well in the laundry, but you have to clip the threads frequently.  The dye does run, so handwash (recommended) or wash with very dark or like colors.

It was shipped and delivered very fast!(4 days total) I like the silhouette, but it's a little snug around my hips, fault of my own probably. It does smell weird out of the package and the smell sticks to whatever it touches. Wash it ASAP, and washign it lets out extra dye that's in the fabric, that could stain skin, clothes, etc. The embroidery is pretty, but there were thread ends poking out of the fabric, simple pulling through the other side and tacking helps. Overall, besides having to wash it to get out smell and dye I really like it.
it is small on me but I love the color and design will keep it my be in a few months I can fit into trying to loss weight.
